title: Ticket #4666: Clarify rescue DAG description
description: In the part of the DAGMan documentation dealing with rescue DAGs, the prose about how to run a "full" rescue DAG is mixed in with the "default" course of action, which clearly confused this user. I think that the stuff about the "full" rescue DAG should get moved to a little sub-sub-section right before the "Rescue DAG Generated When There Are Parse Errors" sub-sub section.
remarks:
2014-Oct-21 09:46:59 by wenger:
We should also clearly state that -force will prevent any rescue DAGs from being run.
check_ins: 2014-Oct-24 16:13   Check-in [41440]: Gittrac #4666: Reorganized (and hopefully clarified) the Rescue DAG documentation in the DAGMan manual section. (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
